thread.title: Ku6 Media to Report Second Quarter 2015 Financial Results on September 18, 2015
thread.title_full: Ku6 Media to Report Second Quarter 2015 Financial Results on September 18, 2015

author: PRNW
title: Ku6 Media to Report Second Quarter 2015 Financial Results on September 18, 2015
text:
BEIJING Ku6 Media Co., Ltd., (NASDAQ: KUTV) ("Ku6" or the "Company"), a leading Internet video company in China focused on User Generated Content ("UGC"), will announce its unaudited financial results for the second quarter 2015 on Friday, September 18, 2015 , before the opening of the U.S. markets.
About Ku6 Media Co., Ltd.
Ku6 Media Co., Ltd. (NASDAQ: KUTV) is a leading Internet video company in China focused on User Generated Content ("UGC"). Through its premier online brand and online video website, www.ku6.com , Ku6 Media provides online video uploading and sharing service, video reports, information and entertainment in China. For more information about Ku6 Media, please visit http://ir.ku6.com .
